array.name: arrayQuotes
array.item: "´If you fall I will be there.´ - Floor"
"´One of the most productive days was throwing away 1000 lines of code.´ - Ken Thomson"
"´Good design adds value faster than it adds cost.´ - Thomas C. Gale"
"´Talk is cheap. Show me the code.´ - Linus Thorvald"
"´Always borrow money from a pessimist. He wont expect it back´ - Oscar Wilde"
